May 15, 1999 D SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Championship Section)
SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Championship Section) 1 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest ebbw-vale-contest-championship-section
Test Piece Contest
Isaiah 40
Ebbw Vale Leisure Centre, Ebbw Vale, Blaenau Gwent, Wales, UK Best soloist - cornet Mid Rhondda. Best horn - Tredegar. Prizes - 1st £100, 2nd £60, 3rd £40. 5 bands competed.
May 3, 2009, 6:29 p.m. June 30, 2020, 9:48 p.m.
1 Tredegar Town Band Thomas Wyss
2 Cory Band Jeremy Wise
3 Tongwynlais Temperance Band Adrian Morton
4 Thomas Coaches Mid Rhondda Band Alan Gibbs
5 Parc and Dare Band Nigel Taken
